name: four simple washcloths
notes:
these are four patterns for simple, yet beautiful textured washcloths.

each one uses about one ball of cotton yarn and takes between one-two hours to complete.

they are suitable for beginners and a quick project for intermediate crocheters. 

the first pattern in the set comes with a video that demonstrates the building of the washcloth and the edging. the edging is the same for all the washcloths.

the different stitch combinations are a lot of fun to learn and to combine into a set of washcloths. make one, or make many and gift them to family and friends.
